snippet: Farouk Hosni, who was culture minister for more than two decades, was charged with corruption on Tuesday, joining other former officials accused of using their positions to enrich themselves.
abstract: Farouk Hosni, Egyptian man who served for more than two decades as culture minister under Pres Hosni Mubarak, is charged with corruption; Justice Ministry officials also announce an investigation into new corruption claims against the deposed leader, his sons and his wife.
lead_paragraph: Farouk Hosni, who was culture minister for more than two decades, was charged with corruption on Tuesday, joining other former officials accused of using their positions to enrich themselves.

headline.seo: Ex-Official Farouk Hosni Charged With Corruption in Egypt
headline.main: Egypt to Try Ex-Official on Charge of Corruption
headline.print_headline: Egypt to Try Ex-Official On Charge Of Corruption
